about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes the French SNCASE SE 100 Tier V heavy fighter. This excellent warbird packs a lot of punch due to its four 20-millimeter autocannons that are accurate and deadly. Add to that good airspeed and powerful boost — and you are fully prepared to dominate the skies! In addition, you will receive a skilled pilot, a decoration set, and days of Premium account. You will also get a thematic emblem that provides a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%)!

DLC Content:
  • SNCASE SE-100, a French Tier V heavy fighter
  • 1 Hangar slot
  • 1 crew trained to 100% with 6 free skill points
  • Unique decoration set (paint scheme, nose art and emblem)
  • 7 days of Premium account

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higher
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
